title: Quartz slab countertops in kitchens and baths
map_address: 3627 Stone Way N near Stone Way N
posting_body: Welcome to The Hayes on Stone Way
Are you looking for apartments in Fremont, Seattle?
The Hayes on Stone Way offers a mix of modern studio, one-, and two-bedroom floor plans that fit your lifestyle and needs.
Each apartment is designed to fit your unique individuality.
The picturesque, modern exterior of our apartment building is combined with luxurious amenities inside each apartment.
Residents will also love our modern community amenities.
All of our apartment and community features are coupled with being in a fantastic location, within close proximity to local restaurants, parks, and shopping.
Contact us today to schedule a tour of our apartments in Fremont Seattle.

This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 670 Sq.
Ft.
Features
- Efficiently designed and inviting floor plans with ample kitchen storage
- Tall ceilings and large, operable windows
- 2 distinct and sophisticated color palette choices in appealing, modern tones
- Many homes with private terraces
- Quartz slab countertops in kitchens and baths
- Some units utilize sliding glass dividers for maximizing interior space
- Energy Star rated Whirlpool appliances, including microwave, dishwasher and range/oven, and full-size washer and dryer in each home
- Several homes with west and south (Lake Union) facing views
- Louver blinds
- European style cabinets with brushed nickel hardware accents
- Energy efficient lighting including versatile track lighting systems custom configured to each floor plan
- High-speed data wiring
- Noise-absorbing, soft commercial vinyl plank floors paired with carpet in bedrooms
- Stainless steel kitchen sinks with pull-out designer selected plumbing fixtures
Community Amenities
- Game Room with bar, lounge area, community refrigerator, and shuffleboard
- Pet washroom
- Controlled access entry system
- Business Center with workspaces and whiteboards
- Media Room: movie screen, terraced seating, and entertainment bar
- Locally commissioned artwork
- Bike storage, maintenance station, and bike wash area
- Resident rooftop deck with spectacular views, bar seating areas, lounge chairs, heaters, BBQs, Outdoor TV, community garden, and fire pits
- Fitness room loaded with professional-grade equipment
- 24-hour on-line concierge and management services
- Luxer One package locker system with 24/7 secured access
- Street-level retail space
- Acoustical sound engineered throughout the building
Office Hours
Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM
Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM
The Hayes
